page.title: 03Fishing on the river Cuch.
page.content: I like going fishing with my father on the river Cuch.My father goes fishing to have a rest from his work.We use worms for bait and sometimes we use spinners.Father and I get the worms from the dunghill.Sometimes I get a bucket of hot water and I put some Fairy Liquid into the bucket and I tip the water onto the lawn and the worms come up to the surface.We catch rainbow trout most of the time.Once dad caught a flat fish in the river Cuch.It had red spots on it.Father and I buy a trout fishing licence at the beginning of the season.The licence costs Â£6.80 for my father and Â£4.60 for me.I have a red and black rod which is four feet long.My dad has a five foot light brown rod.I enjoy fishing very much.
